title: The Richmond heiress, or, A woman once in the right a comedy acted at the Theatre Roayl [sic] by Their Majesties servants / written by Tho. D'Urfey.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
notes: Imperfect: pages faded with slight loss of print. Pages 20-end of defective Harvard Library copy spliced at end.
